flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=27>>27 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 27 bags = <<48-27=12>>12 bags for $22 each
12 bags were sold for 12 bags x $22/bag = $<<12*22=264>>264
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $264 = $<<306+250+264=820>>820
The salesman made $820 - $576 = $<<820-576=244>>244 in profit.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
